text: "Youth" is a 2018 song by Shawn Mendes featuring Khalid. It is the third single from his third studio album Shawn Mendes. It went to number 35 in the United Kingdom and Scotland, number 65 in the United States, number 22 in New Zealand and Canada, number 18 in Malaysia, Norway and Austria, number 14 in Denmark, number 19 in Switzerland and Australia, number 15 in Hungary and number 10 in Portugal. ==Track listing== *Digital download # "Youth" – 3:09 *Digital download – acoustic # "Youth" – 3:09 ==References== Category:2018 songs Category:2010s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Shawn Mendes songs
title: Youth (Shawn Mendes song)
